title: The Billionaire Bargain 2
description: It was a deal made in the boardroom and sealed in the bedroom.  It all seemed so simple: I pretend to be his fianceé, his company share prices stabilize, and everyone wins. It’s all just for show.  So why does he keep kissing me? And why do I let him? Grant Devlin is the bane of my existence — not the man of my dreams. But now the lines are getting blurred, and between the kissing and the champagne (and did I mention the kissing?) I’m getting way too comfortable as the future Mrs Devlin.  Something’s got to give, and it better not be my self-control…
author: Lila Monroe
